puththalama sita kolambaa saha galla haraha mathara dakwa wana muhudu pradeshawala sihin wasi athi wiya haka.diwayina wata wana muhudu pradeshawala sulan niritha desin hamana athara sulage wegaya pa.ki.mi. 35-45 k pamana we.puththalama sita mannarama haraha kankasanthuraya dakwa saha mathara sita hambanthota haraha pothuwil dakwa wana muhudu pradeshawala sulage wegaya witin wita pa.ki.mi. 60 dakwa wadiwiya haki athara, ewita ema muhudu pradesha ralu wiya haka.sesu muhudu pradeshawala da sulage wegaya witin wita pa.ki.mi. 50 dakwa wadiwiya haki athara, ewita ema muhudu pradeshatharamak ralu wiya haka.dhiwara saha nawuka prajawa me pilibadawa itha awadhanayen katayuthu karana lesa kalaguna widya departhamenthuwa illa sitinawa.

wadha dim athulu manawa himikam ullanghana sambandha awadanama awapramana karanu pinisa polis sewaye wruththiyabhawaya thawaduratath wardhanaya kirime awashyathawaya brithanya aanduwa penwadena thawath karunaki.

indiyawata bududahama wyaptha kirimata kihipawitak uthsaha kalath pera ki hethuwa nisa eya asarthaka wiya.
lankawa indiyawe paththa aran pakisthanaya ridawima rajya thanthrika waradak. 1991 di indiyawa me de me widhiyatama lankawata kala.
widhayaka niladhari mattamedi athkara ganna sarthakathwayen 90% kma bhawamaya buddhiya nisa bawayi dan piliganima.

eksath jathinge kriyakari kandayama shri lankawata paminima sidu wenne, athurudan wuwange pawul saha manawa himikam kriyakarin wisin wasara gananawak thisse; balahathkarayen athurudan kirimata erehi antharjathika sammuthiya sammatha kirimatath, shri lankawa thula athurudan kirim saparadhi kriya ganayata athulath kirimatath, marana sahathika wenuwata athurudahan wu bawata sahathika nikuth kirimatath, kala illim itu kirimata rajaya wisin kamaththa pala kara masa dekak athulathayi.

ek udaharanayak washayen thalangama pradeshaye yachnya madhyasthanayakata kada wadi ehi depolawalata hani kirima sambandhayen bodubala sena sanwidhanaye mahalekam galagodaaththe gnyanasara himiyan athulu 13 denakuta erehiwa nithipathiwaraya wisin kolambaa mahadhikaranaye pawara thibu naduwa penwa diya haka.
pirimi lamayeku wiwaha wiyayuththe hediyak samanginuyi.
kohomath siri lanka karayanta rata karanna ba.

rajya sammana dinu...
mage ammayi thaththayi mamayi sathutin unna dawasak eeka, ee dawasa mathak wennath ekka mama ee mala mage langama thiya gannawahamadama, sayiman dannawada deyak ?"

meki manussa le ura bipu ghathakayingen samaharek mana lesa sakasa gath yatirawula samaginda, thawath samaharek yatirawula nomathiwa piliwelata sakas karana lada udurawula samaginda, nawina pannaye ti shart, denim, digu kalisam, besbol thoppi, krida sapaththu palanda nawina pannayen sarasi pamina sitiyaha.
mama oyawa beragaththa neda?

matath thiyenawa langadima oya wage ma thoppiyak daganna.

sancharaka ostreliyanu melbarn fantri gali disthrik krida sangamaye awu.18n pahala krikat kandama samaga kilinochchi madhya maha widyala kridanganayedi pawathi wissayi 20 krikat tharagayen lakunu 52ka jayak himikara ganimata uthuru-nangenahira eekabaddha awu.18n pahala krikat kandayama samathwiya.kilinochchi aarakshaka sena aagnyapathi mejar jenaral udaya perera mahathage upadeshakathwayen aarakshaka sena mulasthana 57 senankaye sanwidhanayen pawathi tharagaye kasiye wasiya dinu uthuru-nangenahira kandayama oowara 20 thuladi kadulu 7k dawi lakunu 174k ras kaleya.es.nishantha lakunu 51k wartha kirimata samathwiya.
ee hangima niyametama danuna.
eekata para hadagannayi me widiyata ara blog bashawenma kiyana aakarayata panduru thaluwe.
meyin parani parsiyan bhashawa ayath wanne parsiyan kantharayen batahirata wihidi giya pradeshayata yi.
samanala ranak se igili akurata giya pasal kale..
eekabadde maththala giyadama guwan yana dekak godabawe kohomada?
mewa blog ekata damana widiya saralawama mata kiyanawada?
“aa” aakruthiya departhamenthu pradhaniyage kotasa sampurna kirima
eda lamunwa siti owun adatath idahita hamuwenawa.
maththala guwan thotupale meheyum katayuthu wenuwen yana adhika wiyadama ha eya pariharanaya karana magin sankhyawa awama wima nisa ehi meheyum nathara kirimata rajaya thiranaya kara thibe.
lama wiya wage kalayak aaye thiyanawada ?labana aathme thamayi ithin.niyamayi machan.
ema nisama samahara tharunayayo thaniwama jiwath wana thama bodima melesa danna hithuwathunge bothal sadawalata labadi masakata honda mudalak upaya ganithi.
kela bindithi aadiya wisiwimata ida athi nisa shabda nagamin katha bas kirimen walakinna (mukha wadam bandaganimen meya walakwa gatha haka).
ikmanata nagitapan male.
nanuoya nagaranthara dumriya samaga kolambaa bala yana kanediyanu enjima.
mahawihara wanshika syamopali maha nikaye shri rohana parshwaya magin mewara pawathwanuye ehi 33 wana upasampada maha winaya karmaya yi.
“mama ahagenayi inne.”

aanduwa pawasanuye meya “jathika aarakshawa ha rate aarthika sanwardhanaya wegawath kirimata pahasukam salasima” sandaha ganu labu piyawarak bawayi.
me nisa langadi nam api dennata githayak karanna bariwuna.
ithamath sarthakawa thewana karthuwa (2011 okthombar sita desambar dakwa) nima karamin shakthimath mulya warshayaka awasanaya kara piyanagayi.
